channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: What Florida football coach considers a 'huge win for college football'
item.description: CountFlorida footballcoach Billy Napier as someone pleased that walk-ons from the 2024 season won't count against roster limits set during the House vs NCAA Settlement.

item.title: VOTE for Sarasota-Manatee's all-time best state championship volleyball team
item.description: The Herald-Tribune has gone back and documented the area volleyball teams that have won state championships.

item.title: Trump doubles down on accusations against Obama amid Epstein fallout
item.description: PresidentDonald Trumpis ramping up accusations that former PresidentBarack Obamawas involved in a 2016 conspiracy to undermine Trump's victory, which the former president's office called a “weak attempt at distraction.”

item.title: Court allows July 31 execution in 1994 Florida murder case
item.description: TALLAHASSEE — The Florida Supreme Court on July 22 refused to halt the scheduled July 31 execution of Edward Zakrzewski, who was sentenced to death in the 1994 murders of his wife and two children in their Okaloosa County home.

item.description: "Bachelor in Paradise" season 10is heating up. Last night's new episode featured the first rose ceremony with the "Golden" contestants and the first time an intergenerational rose has ever been given out.

item.title: Florida sheriff deputies will soon be able to make…
item.description: Florida sheriffs' deputies will soon begin to detain undocumented immigrants, and officials say they will need more detention space to hold them all but they're still being blocked by the feds.

item.description: TheUnited Church of Christreaffirms and proclaims people of transgender, nonbinary and gender diverse experiences are beloved by God, with unique gifts and graces for the life of the world.
